revised_title: Ernest William Hobson: A Pioneering Mathematician and Educator
tldr: The article is an obituary for Ernest William Hobson, a prominent English mathematician and educator. Hobson made significant contributions to the fields of mathematical analysis and function theory. He authored a well-known trigonometry textbook and held various positions in the mathematical community, including serving as the Sadleirian Professor of Mathematics at the University of Cambridge. Hobson was also a keen philosopher and active in university affairs, with a strong interest in the development of the London Mathematical Society.
